ygData.subject: Re: Running Through Beholder
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found running past Evil Eyes not treacherous.  BUT, you need to con them from extreme range and make sure they are NOT King Xorbb!  He is very
ygData.messageBody:
I have found running past Evil Eyes not treacherous. BUT, you need to con
them from extreme range and make sure they are NOT King Xorbb! He is very
aggressive and terrible! He saw my Bard when he was 17 or 18 and cast a very
nasty combination of spells that left me dead in seconds.

Nevertheless, I think Beholder is easier to traverse than HHP.



>
> Is it possible to run through Beholder with Accelerando? I made the trip
> through last weekend crawling along high on the cliff and it was nerve
> wracking. I would much rather make a fast dash through and get it over
> with! But I saw at least a dozen evil eyes from my vantage point on the
> cliff wall...can I run past fast enough to avoid trouble?
>
> Paralto of Povar
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> How many communities do you think join ONElist each day?
> http://www.onelist.com
> More than 1,000! Create yours now!
